description: This is a configuration include file used within the Yocto Project build system for setting tune parameters specific to the ARM Cortex-A77 processor architecture. It defines compiler flags, feature sets, and package architecture configurations tailored for the Cortex-A77.

methods.name: TUNE_CCARGS
methods.description: Appends CPU-specific compiler arguments for Cortex-A77 if the 'cortexa77' feature is enabled.
